skill_constraints: Backend developers at >95% utilization in Sprint 1; Single points of failure in DevOps and QA.
resource_bottlenecks: Senior Backend Developer (backend.dev1) is the primary bottleneck.
mitigation_strategies: Hope for no unforeseen issues. Requires overtime if any complexity is underestimated.

skill_constraints: Single points of failure remain, but load is manageable.
mitigation_strategies: Rebalance Sprint 1 tasks across three sprints, bringing utilization to <80% per sprint. Allows time for knowledge sharing.

skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for the new developer in the first week.
resource_bottlenecks: DevOps and QA remain single points of failure.
mitigation_strategies: Add one Mid-level Backend Developer. Reassign tasks from `backend.dev2` and some from `backend.dev1` to the new hire, bringing all backend utilization to ~75%.
